class agents.RecruiterAgent[source]

Bases: object

Agent responsible for recruiting experts.

recruit(input_query: str, temperature: float = 0.7) → str[source]

Recruits experts based on the input query.

Parameters:

  • temperature (float) – The temperature for the LLM.

Returns:

A CrewAI Agent configured as a Chief of Staff to find experts.

agents.create_expert_agent(profile: dict, temperature: float = 0.7) → Agent[source]

Creates an expert agent based on a profile.

Parameters:

  • profile (dict) – A dictionary containing ‘name’, ‘role’, ‘bias’, and ‘skill’.

  • temperature (float) – The temperature for the LLM.

Returns:

A CrewAI Agent configured with the expert’s profile.

Return type:

Agent

agents.get_alpha_evolve_expert()[source]

Returns the systematic AlphaEvolve expert definition.

agents.get_llm(temperature=0.7)[source]

Retrieves the LLM configuration.

Parameters:

temperature (float) – The temperature for the LLM.

Returns:

A CrewAI LLM instance configured with the default model and API key.

Return type:

LLM
